  • Constructor Details

    • CharStream

      public CharStream​(int width, int height)
      This constructor initializes the stream's width and height to the given ones. The content is saved in a height * width char matrix and the colors in a height * width String matrix.
      Parameters:
      width - is the width of the stream.
      height - is the height of the stream.

  • Method Details

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      This method returns the width of the stream.
      Returns:
      an integer.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      This method returns the height of the stream.
      Returns:
      an integer.

    • getChar

      public char getChar​(int x, int y)
      This method returns the char saved on the stream's position X, Y
      Parameters:
      x - X coord
      y - Y param
      Returns:
      an char.

    • addChar

      public void addChar​(char content, int x, int y, BackColor backColor)
      This method add the given char and its background color to the stream's position X, Y,
      Parameters:
      content - is the char to add.
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.
      backColor - is the color of the background.

    • addChar

      public void addChar​(char content, int x, int y, ForeColor foreColor)
      This method add the given char and its color to the stream's position X, Y,
      Parameters:
      content - is the char to add.
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.
      foreColor - is the color of the content.

    • addChar

      public void addChar​(char content, int x, int y)
      This method add the given char to the stream's position X, Y,
      Parameters:
      content - is the char to add.
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.

    • addChar

      public void addChar​(char content, int x, int y, ForeColor foreColor, BackColor backColor)
      This method add the given char, its color and background color to the stream's position X, Y,
      Parameters:
      content - is the char to add.
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.
      foreColor - is the color of the content.
      backColor - is the color of the background.

    • addString

      public void addString​(int x, int y, java.lang.String str, ForeColor foreColor, BackColor backColor)
      This method add the given String, its color and background color starting from the stream's position X, Y,
      Parameters:
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.
      str - is the String to add.
      foreColor - is the color of the content.
      backColor - is the color of the background.

    • addString

      public void addString​(int x, int y, java.lang.String str, ForeColor foreColor)
      This method add the given String and its color starting from the stream's position X, Y,
      Parameters:
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.
      str - is the String to add.
      foreColor - is the color of the content.

    • addColor

      public void addColor​(int x, int y, ForeColor foreColor, BackColor backColor)
      This method set the content color and the background color in the stream's position X, Y,
      Parameters:
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.
      foreColor - is the content color to set.
      backColor - is the background color to set.

    • addColor

      public void addColor​(int x, int y, BackColor backColor)
      This method set the background color in the stream's position X, Y,
      Parameters:
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.
      backColor - is the background color to set.

    • addColor

      public void addColor​(int x, int y, ForeColor foreColor)
      This method set the content color in the stream's position X, Y,
      Parameters:
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.
      foreColor - is the content color to set.

    • setMessage

      public void setMessage​(java.lang.String message, int x, int y, ForeColor foreColor, BackColor backColorWord, BackColor backColor)
      This method set a graphical message on the stream starting from position X, Y.
      Parameters:
      message - is the graphical message.
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.
      foreColor - is the color of the message's boarders.
      backColorWord - is the color of the internal background.
      backColor - is the color of the external background

    • setMessage

      public void setMessage​(java.lang.String message, int x, int y, ForeColor foreColor, BackColor backColorWord)
      This method set a graphical message on the stream starting from position X, Y.
      Parameters:
      message - is the graphical message.
      x - is the coordinate X.
      y - is the coordinate Y.
      foreColor - is the color of the message's boarders.
      backColorWord - is the color of the internal background.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method resets the stream's content and its colors.

    • print

      public void print​(java.io.PrintStream stream)
      This method prints the stream's content and its colors.
      Parameters:
      stream - Stream used to print
